pageTitle: Baixar CDL Help App | Teste CDL Grátis para iOS e Android
pageDescription: Baixe CDL Help - o melhor app gratuito para preparação CDL. 1000+ questões traduzidas para português. Passe no exame de carteira comercial na primeira tentativa. Baixe agora!
heroTitle: Get CDL Help on Your Phone
heroDescription: [PT] Practice CDL tests anytime, anywhere with our mobile app. Available in 8 languages with over 1000 questions to help you pass your Commercial Driver's License exam.
whyChooseDescription: [PT] Everything you need to pass your CDL exam in one app
multilingualSupportDesc: [PT] Study in your preferred language with support for 8 languages including English, Spanish, Russian, and more.
comprehensiveQuestionsDesc: [PT] Access our extensive database covering all CDL test categories including General Knowledge, Air Brakes, and Hazmat.
progressTrackingDesc: [PT] Monitor your improvement with detailed statistics and identify areas that need more practice.
examSimulationDesc: [PT] Practice with questions that closely match the actual DMV exam format and difficulty level.
screenshotsDescription: [PT] Get a preview of our intuitive interface and powerful features
screenshotAlt3: [PT] CDL Help test results and progress
ctaTitle: [PT] Ready to Pass Your CDL Exam?
ctaDescription: [PT] Join thousands of successful truck drivers who prepared with CDL Help
